# Code and data {.unnumbered}

## Code

The code is presented as annotated notebooks, rendered in html files that are in the table of contents of this page.

- Supplementary Information 1: ML approach to classify species based on prey counts (Random Forest)
- Supplementary Information 2: Hierarchical Bayesian Model to describe differences in isotopic values between and within species.
- Supplementary Information 3: Amplitudes and comparisons of the isotopic niches (SIBER)
- Supplementary Information 4: Isotopic niche overlaps (nicheROVER)

## Data

The data is available in the [correspondig GitHub repository](https://github.com/ArturoBell/01072022), along with the unrendered notebooks.
